Headline: Temporary Northbound #4 Cottage Grove Reroute near Cottage Grove/84th
ShortDescription: Northbound 4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted near Cottage Grove/84th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #4 Cottage Grove buses are temporarily rerouted via Cottage Grove, 87th, King Drive, 83rd, Cottage Grove, and resume normal route, due to street blockage near Cottage Grove/84th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running with wait times of up to 30 minutes; we're working to restore service. Allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are running, but with extended wait times. Some riders may experience wait times of up to 30 minutes while our crews work to restore regular service levels.

Use trackers to look for live arrival information and consider available alternatives, such a local bus routes or buses to/from other 'L' lines.

Allow extra travel time.
